it.polimi.se2018.view

Class VirtualView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable<ViewEvent>
      • it.polimi.se2018.view.View
        • it.polimi.se2018.view.VirtualView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<Event>

    public class VirtualView
extends View
    A View that lives on the server side. It is connected with the model and the controller and, through the network, sends and receive Event to a RemoteView that lives on the client side.
